entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump HOPING you caught coronavirus from not wearing a mask and shaking hands at the factory today.  Too bad #Sudafed can't help.  I feel sorry for all of the people that had to interact with you and put themselves at risk. #IdiotInChief   #loser  #worstpresidentever #Biden2020
